Package beetle_kit

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnswerPanel
    This class is a panel that lets users type their answers for the estimation game and allows them to view the full unblocked grid, as well as the correct calculation and estimation for the given grid.
    BeetleKit
    This class starts the Beetle Kit
    EstimationGame
    Chemistry Passport Project Runs the Estimation Game
    EstimationGrid
    Chemistry Passport Project The grid data for the Estimation Game
    EstimationStartPage
    The first page of the estimation game, which displays the instructions and lets the user choose the default mode or one of the three color-blind modes and allows them to start playing the game
    GridCell
    Chemistry Passport Project This represents the information contained in a cell in the grid for the Estimation Game.
    GridView
    Represents the view for the grid
    Tree
    A Tree object that is represented by an Ellipse2D.Double
